# Reporting publication to NVA

The first author should report articles to NVA (Norwegian Research Information Repository). If you are affiliated with a Norwegian research institution, you can follow the guides on NVA: [NVA Help Center](https://sikt.no/en/tjenester/nasjonalt-vitenarkiv-nva/hjelpeside-nva)

For NIPH employees, you need to use FEIDE to log in into NVA and register projects: [NVA](https://nva.sikt.no/)

::: callout-important
-   It is not possible to delete projects (until further notice). If you want to test things, use [**https://test.nva.sikt.no/**](https://test.nva.sikt.no/)â€‹
:::
